snippet.title: Age of Wonders 4: Story Trailer | Pre-Order Now!
snippet.description:
Pre-order now: https://www.paradoxinteractive.com/games/age-of-wonders-4

The Wizard Kings return in the new story trailer for Age of Wonders 4, launching on May 2, 2023 for PC, PlayStation®5, and Xbox Series X and S. The Premium Edition is available now for pre-orders on all platforms, including additional in-game cosmetic options and the game’s Expansion Pass.

Paradox on YouTube:
---------------------------------
ParadoxInteractive - http://youtube.com/ParadoxInteractive
Trailers, Feature Breakdowns, Dev Diaries, and more.

Paradox Grand Strategy - http://youtube.com/ParadoxGrandStrategy
Gameplay of our Grand Strategy Games. CK3, EU4 and HOI4.
